title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – May 2 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – May 2 2022
description:
Buck hosts solo with Clay away. The left doubles down on defense of Soviet Mary Poppins. Buck says, "Soviet Mary Poppins coming soon to your neighborhood." New York Times runs hit piece on Tucker Carlson. Mayorkas on the disinformation czar; says she is politically neutral! Mayorkas admits to well over 1 million illegal gotaways under Biden. Rep. Jayapal, Sen. Menendez want Title 42 lifted. Buck sums it up, "Cut the line. Come to the country illegally. That's the incentive structure." Trevor Noah, who Buck notes has made The Daily Show much less relevant, on Biden at WH correspondents' dinner.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
